Pixar Animation Studios | Emeryville, California | Full time | Onsite | https://goo.gl/JtVvDM

Yippee! My team (Post Pipeline Engineering) is a bunch of silly/smart people who get things done.

Technologies and skills we each use (honestly, all these things almost every day) in no particular order:

  Python / Django / Flask / Tornado | Image and video processing / Transcoding pipelines / FFmpeg / jpeg2000
  OpenShift / Docker / Kubernetes | Software design principles: Open/closed, Single responsibility, Dependency inversion, etc
  Kafka / RabbitMQ | Javascript / AngularJS | Massive parallel computing systems / Distributed processing / Render farms
  Golang | Git | Testing methodologies / Test Driven Development | Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment
It's a ridiculous(ly awesome) place to work. Our team functions where Systems (these lovely people: https://systems.pixar.com) and Production intersect. Here's the posting again: https://goo.gl/JtVvDM
